meanings.sent1: The hempy rope was strong and durable.
meanings.sent2: The hempy fabric had a rough texture.
meanings.sent3: The hempy sack held all the potatoes without tearing.
meanings.sent4: The hempy walls of the old barn seemed to breathe with history.
meanings.sent5: The hempy smell filled the room, reminding me of the countryside.

meanings.sent1: She wore a hempy dress to the eco-friendly event.
meanings.sent2: The hempy paper was environmentally sustainable.
meanings.sent3: The hempy bag was both stylish and eco-conscious.
meanings.sent4: The hempy fibers were woven into a sturdy rope.
meanings.sent5: The hempy lotion moisturized her skin naturally.

meanings.definition: Feeling relaxed or content, as if under the influence of hemp.
meanings.sent1: After a long bath, she felt hempy and carefree.
meanings.sent2: The hammock swayed gently, making him feel hempy.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked hempy lying in the sunbeam.
meanings.sent4: The cozy blanket made her feel hempy and warm.
meanings.sent5: The peaceful garden made him feel hempy and at ease.
